actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department, Labor Department.

official_title: A bill to extend the Federal Supplementary Compensation Program six months.

summary.text: Amends title VI (also known as the Federal Supplemental Compensation Act of 1982) of the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982 to extend the Federal supplemental unemployment compensation program through weeks beginning on or before September 30, 1983. Makes conforming changes in the definition of "period of eligibility," with respect to any individual, under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to extend the Federal Supplementary Compensation Program six months.
